links.*: Of the Ordering of the Shire

wikitext.*:
The '''Free Fair''' was a festival that the [[Hobbits]] held during the three days of [[Lithedays|Lithe]]. It took place in the [[White Downs]] near [[Michel Delving]] and among the attractions was the election of the [[Mayor of Michel Delving]] held every seven years. It was called 'Free' because anyone could set up a stall without charge.<ref>{{FR|Ordering}}</ref>

At the Free Fair of {{SR|1420}} [[Frodo Baggins]] resigned as Deputy Mayor and [[Will Whitfoot]] returned to office for seven years.<ref>{{RK|VI9}}</ref>  In {{SR|1427|n}} Will Whitfoot resigned and [[Samwise Gamgee]] was elected Mayor, beginning the first of seven terms in office.<ref>{{App|Later}}</ref>
